name.japanese: 方舟マクシムのドック

description: A hidden cave in Upper Yard where Enel constructed and stored his massive flying ark, the Ark Maxim. The cave is large enough to house the enormous golden vessel.

keyEvents.title: First Appearance of the Ark Maxim
keyEvents.description: Nami follows Enel to this cave where the Ark Maxim is revealed for the first time.
keyEvents.significance: Central location for revealing Enel's ultimate plan and his means of reaching Fairy Vearth.

keyEvents.title: Enel Explains the Ark's Power System
keyEvents.description: Enel reveals how the Ark Maxim was built using gold from Shandora and powered by his Devil Fruit abilities.
keyEvents.significance: Explains the technological and mystical basis of the ark's capabilities.

description: The sacred island of the Shandia people, the ancient land of Shandora that was launched into the sky 400 years ago. Now the site of the climactic battles with Enel.

keyEvents.title: Wyper vs. Enel Battle Conclusion
keyEvents.description: Wyper stops Enel's heart with the Reject Dial in Upper Yard.
keyEvents.significance: Site of major battle between Shandia warriors and Enel.

keyEvents.title: Zoro's Defeat
keyEvents.description: Zoro is defeated by Enel's Kiten technique in Upper Yard.
keyEvents.significance: Shows Enel's systematic elimination of all threats.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Discovers the Defeated
keyEvents.description: Luffy finds his crew and the Shandia warriors defeated across Upper Yard.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the final confrontation between Luffy and Enel.
